T02TD1347.1E:107b-1: bi ma la pra bh'a n'a ma m'u la ta ntr'a nu s'a ri n'i dv'a da sha s'a ha sri k'a la ghu k'a la tsa kra tantra r'a dza t'i k'a /
T02TD1347.1E:107b-3: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad /
T02TD1347.1E:107b-4: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba /
T02TD1347.1E:107b-5: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-6: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-7: srid gsum skye dang 'jig pa med //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-8: shes dang shes bya gcig pa'i sku //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-10: rnam par bcas kyang rnam med bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma ste de yis 'khyud //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-11: skye 'jig spangs pa'i 'gyur med bde ba dang ldan bzhad pa la sogs bde ba spangs //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed mdzad sku gsum dag dang ldan zhing dus gsum yang dag rig / kun mkhyen mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis med de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-13: sangs rgyas seng ge'i khrir bzhugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par dag pa srid pa gsum gyis mchod //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-14: de nyid gcig pu sku yi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa bcu drug srid med srid par gnas //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-15: shes dang shes bya gcig gyur rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig yan lag rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-16: bden don byang chub sems ni rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gyur dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-17: kun mkhyen ye shes sku ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i lhan cig skyes dang de bzhin chos kyi sku //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-18: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku yang nyin byed sku dang padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-19: rnam par thar dang sku gsung thugs chags srid 'das 'byor pa rnal 'byor dag pa shes rab dang //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-20: thabs ni gnyis med gang zhig lha mi lha min gyis bstod dang po'i sangs rgyas de la 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-21: ye shes stong nyid ye shes kyis //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-22: legs dag rnam dag 'gyur ba med //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-23: sems ni mtshan med ye shes kyis //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-24: legs dag gnyis med chos bdag nyid //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-25: dag ni smon med ye shes kyis //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-26: dag pa gsang sngags mi zad sgra //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-27: de bzhin mngon par 'dus ma byas //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-28: ye shes kyis dag dri ma med //
T02TD1347.1E:107b-29: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sbyor //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje sems //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-4: dam tshig sems dpar gsungs pa gang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-5: dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-6: thog mtha' med cing zhi ba yi //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-7: byang chub sems de la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-8: sprul pa yi ni sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-9: ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-10: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-11: ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-12: dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-13: ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-15: ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa ni //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-16: sad rmi gnyid stug bzhi pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-17: dbang po gnyis skyes bde min zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-18: ye shes sems dang ngag dang lus //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-19: gnas bzhir yang dag mi gnas te //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-20: las kyi phyag rgya yongs dor zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-21: ye shes phyag rgya rnam par spangs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-22: phyag rgya che las yang dag skyes //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-23: lhan skyes gzhan dang 'grogs pa min //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-24: rnam rtog bsgom pa las 'das pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-25: phyag rgya chen po mi 'gyur bde //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-26: gzung dang 'dzin pa dbyibs dag dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-27: rtog dang brjod pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-28: dri za'i grong khyer rnam pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-29: pra phab pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-30: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyor //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-31: ae wam yi ge de la 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-32: phra rab rdul gyi chos nyid 'das //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-33: pra phab pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-34: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan ma //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-35: phyag rgya chen mo de la 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-36: sangs rgyas kun gyi skyed mdzad ma //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-37: skye ba dang ni 'jig pa spangs ;
T02TD1347.1E:108a-38: / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa can //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-39: sna tshogs yum de la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-40: a'a li k'a li snyoms 'jug dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-41: h'um phat yi ge sogs spangs kyang //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-44: kun mkhyen ye shes sku zhes pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-45: khyab bdag nyi ma lta bu'i sku ;
T02TD1347.1E:108a-47: de nyid bcu drug dbye ba las //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-48: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-49: rdo rje seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-50: lha dang lha min gyis bstod sngon //
T02TD1347.1E:108a-51: zla bzang gis gsol de la 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-0: ngag dang ye shes gcig spyor rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig @108b thugs dang chos ni gcig tu sbyor //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-1: gsung dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gcig sbyor srid gsum gyis mchod sku dang sprul pa rnal 'byor te //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-2: shes dang shes bya gnyis med srid 'das 'byor pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-3: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid lha mi lha min gyis bstod de la 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-4: zhabs gcig rdo rje nor bur rdul dang nyi ma dang //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-5: gnyis pa gtsug tor khu ba ri bong can la ni //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-6: rtag tu mi chod dbyer med 'dod par bkod gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-7: 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i gtso la spyi bos 'dud //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-8: rlung ma chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor lhun po padma dang ;
T02TD1347.1E:108b-9: / zla nyi dus me'i steng du dbang phyug dang ni bdud kyi mgor //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-10: zhabs ni srid pa'i yum gyi zhabs dang lhan cig bkod gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-11: lha yi dbang pos btud pa'i gtso la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-12: de ltar rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig dpag med bde gshegs rnams kyis bsten cing bstan pa dang ;
T02TD1347.1E:108b-13: / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mchog 'dzin gsang sngags rig pa kun gyis yang dag brjod gyur pa'i //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-14: 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba rnal 'byor de ni dus kyi 'khor lor blun po bdag brjod 'dod //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-15: mkha' la myur 'gro mkha' 'gro'i bdag po 'gro ste 'dab chags gzhan pa 'gro ba min nam ci //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-16: gang du rang gi lus la srid pa mtha' dag sngags bcas pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-17: gsal bar a'a li thig le 'dzin pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-18: chu gter chen po der ni rkyal ba'i slad du rab zhugs pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-19: de la gal te pha rol bdag phyin rgyal ba'i mthu yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-20: gang phyir gsang bdag la gsungs mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-21: stobs bcu pa yis bsdus pa'i rgyud ni sngon du lung bstan pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-22: de phyir dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di ka l'a par //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-23: 'jam dpal gyis ni thub pa mtha' dag rnams la nges par bstan //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-24: 'grel bshad stong phrag drug cu pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-25: zla ba bzang pos bris pa gang //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-26: theg pa kun don gsal byed de //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-27: padma dkar po bdag gis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-28: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'jug cing //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-29: gzhung [?] ni stong phrag bcu gnyis te //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-30: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed dang bcas pa //
T02TD1347.1E:108b-31: bsdus pa'i rgyud la bri bar bya //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-0: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chogs dbang mchog blangs nas @109a * //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-2: rgyud rgyal ma lus thos nas yang dag ye shes lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-3: khengs dang longs spyod 'byor pa du ma btang nas sems ni bla mar gtad byas te //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-4: sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du gtso bo'i 'grel bshad gzhan phan spyod pa mnyan par bya //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-5: mngon shes med gang dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa la gnas bstan bcos du ma yi //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-6: rnam rtog chos kyi snying dang mkhas pa nyid kyi dregs ldan 'grel bshad chen po dag / byed pa de ni glang chen long ba myos bzhin dgra yi rgyud ni rgyal ba'i slad //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-7: gang gnas de yis rang gi rgyud ni nyams byed 'di ni rtag tu bdud kyi gnyen //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-8: mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan rgyal bdag gsung ni mi shes ngang tshul rtag long bas //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-9: theg mchog 'grel bshad byas te long ba gzhan dag lhung du bcug nas dmyal bar rab 'jug pa //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-10: 'gyod pa dang ni srog gcod la sogs mi dge'i lam la bud med bde bas sems drangs shing //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-11: dpal ldan shes rab bde nyams rdo rje'i tshig bcom phyi yi longs spyod dag gis zil mnan pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-12: gang zhig ston pa nyid kyis lung bstan rgyal bdag bde ster rdo rje theg par mtha' dag ni //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-13: 'grel bshad dag dang bsdu ba mdzad pa rdo rje mchog 'dzin bdag 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-14: de dag 'dir ni lha dang lag 'gro mi rnams smin pa'i don du sangs rgyas mthur smra la //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-15: gang dag mngon shes lnga med de dag bdag cag rgyal dbang yin zhes bden pa min pa smra //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-16: ma 'ongs dus na rtag tu rtog ge la sogs bstan bcos la gtad sna tshogs blos //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-17: sangs rgyas pa yang gzhan gyi rtog ge dang phrad dbang gis log pa 'byung 'gyur te //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-18: rtog ge la gtad de yis 'dod pa'i yul la lam ni ston par byed pa gang //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-19: de dag nyid kyi blo ngan skyon ni 'joms byed 'grel bshad bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-20: chags bral med pa'i 'dod chags mtha' yas chu la zhe sdang sbrul dang chu srin dkrigs //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-21: gti mug klong ni rab mang 'gro 'ong nor dang dpal la brkam pa'i rba rlabs can //
T02TD1347.1E:109a-22: 'gyod sogs gsod pa la sogs las kyi rta gdong 'khor mo sgra drag srid pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-0: chu gter la ni dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa'i 'grel bshad @109b rtag tu mnyan pa ste //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-1: shes rab rlung gi dar gyis myur 'gro myang 'das pha rol don gnyer chen po rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-2: dam pa'i bde bas myur du rgal bar byed slad de ni lam gyi 'dren ma dang //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-3: nyon mongs bdud tshogs 'joms pa mkhas pa'i yang dag ye shes yid bzhin nor bu ste //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-4: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid ster 'di ni kun du ston par byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-5: gang zhig phung po la sogs sgrib pa rab bcom yul ni pra phab brgyad lta bu //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-6: kun mkhyen bde ster de nyid gcig pu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya chen mo ste //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-7: de bor sangs rgyas nyid slad nor la chags shing 'khyog po'i snying ldan brtags ma dag / gang gis sten byed rnam brtags blo can de yis de yang 'pho ba thob par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-8: 'dod chags nyams las sdig ste gang phyir shin tu sdug ma las ni zhe sdang skye //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-9: sdang las gti mug 'di las rang gi rdo rje lhung las sems ni rtag rmongs te //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-10: mchog min ma lus bza' dang btung ba la sogs yul gzhan dag la rab tu 'jug / de yis sems la co dris bde ba nyams shing skye ba drug tu 'khor bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-11: kun mkhyen lam don gnyer ba rnams la sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad chen po med //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-12: sna tshogs yul skad ngan pa yis kyang chen po rnams kyi lam la rtag tu 'jug / sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i sems kyi dbang gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gzhan la //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-13: lung ston dag la lha klus bkod pa'i sgra sogs rtsod pa don gnyer rnams kyi gzhan //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-14: yul gyi skad dang zur chag sgra las kyang //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-15: rnal 'byor ldan pas don ni 'dzin byed de //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-16: chu la 'o ma nges par zhugs pa de //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-17: dad pas rab tu phyung nas 'thung bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-18: don dam de nyid yul la rtag tu ni //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-19: chen po rnam dag tshig la rton pa min //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-20: yul gyi ming rnams kyis ni don shes la //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-21: bstan bcos sgra dag gis ni ci zhig bya //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-22: gang zhig zur chag sgra dang sgrar gyur bas //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-23: brjod pa de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-24: gang zhig 'gro ba dag la nyi tshe ba //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-25: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ma yin //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-26: mchog tu mi 'gyur bzhi pa de nyid ni //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab ye shes te //
T02TD1347.1E:109b-28: gang zhig de ni slar yang de bzhin 'di //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-0: rang gi phyag rgya chen mor rgyal bas @110a * //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-2: / shes rab 'grogs las gang gi dkar po zag / de yi bde ba ci yis 'phel bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-3: dpyid dang 'grogs la me tog ma rgyas pa //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-4: ltung ba tsu ta'i 'bras bu ci yis 'byung //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-5: gang gis 'gyur med ma thob sdug bsngal can //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-6: de ni 'gyur ba dang bcas bde ba tshol //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-7: thams cad chu ni tshol byed ts'a ta ka / skom par gyur kyang sa la gnas pa min //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-8: 'khor ba yi ni bde ba mi rtag pa //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-9: 'thob pa min yang rmongs chen tshol bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-10: yang dag rgyal srid bde ba thob pa yang //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-11: thar pa'i don du mkhas pas 'dor bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-12: ji ltar lo yi mtshams su rgya lam na //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-13: ri dags zas can 'khrig pa'i bde ba tshol //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-14: rdo yi phye ma dag gi kha zas can //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-15: phug ron rnams ni rtag tu byed pa ste //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-16: lan cig rtag tu khu ba ltung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-17: gnyis ka la yang mchog gi bde ba med //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-18: de bzhin dka' thub can dang 'dod ldan la //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-19: rmi lam sad pa dag las 'dzag phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-20: ji ltar gnyid log la yang sbrul gyi ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-21: sos btab mi 'tsho de bzhin dka' thub pa //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-22: khu ba sdud pa med phyir stobs med ma'i //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-23: skye gnas de yis nyams par byas pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-24: ji ltar rdo dreg skud pa'i gos dag ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-25: me yis bsregs pa nyid kyis dag 'gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-26: de bzhin skyes bu rnams kyi dam pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-27: sems ni shes rab ye shes dag gis so //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-28: ji ltar dngul chu me yis reg pa las //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-29: 'bros par byed kyi g-yo ba med mi 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-30: de bzhin thabs dang bral ba'i khu ba ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-31: rtag tu skye gnas reg pa dag las so //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-32: ji ltar g-yo ba de yang sman sogs kyi //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-33: stobs kyis me dang phrad pas yang dag 'ching //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-34: de bzhin khu ba shin tu rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-35: shes rab dag dang yang dag phrad pas so //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-36: ji ltar me ni shing la rtag gnas kyang //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-37: gcad dang dbye ba'i thabs kyis mi mthong ste //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-38: gtsub shing gtsub stan lag pas gtsubs pa las //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-39: de la gnas pa dag kyang mthong 'gyur ba //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-40: de bzhin sems kyi 'od gsal rtog pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-41: sgom pa'i thabs rnams dag gis mi mthong ste //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-42: de nyid du 'di rkyang ma dag dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-43: ro ma gcig tu sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:110a-44: sna tshogs rnam rtog la sogs lam gyis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-0: @110b de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-1: bcu drug bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba can //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-2: lam dang bral bas 'thob pa ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-3: bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i h'um dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-4: phat yig la sogs rtog pa dang bral ba //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-5: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid de //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-6: de nyid kyi ni sgrub thabs gzhan yod min //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-7: du ba la sogs mtshan ma dag dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-8: srog rtsol dag gis dbu mar 'bab pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-9: rig ma'i brtul zhugs dag gis rdo rje ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-10: ltung min de bzhin steng du khu ba ste //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-11: lam 'di dag gis sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-12: bde ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med pa zhes ;
T02TD1347.1E:110b-13: / mngon par brjod pa'am pho nya mo kun gyi //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-14: lhan cig skyes pa rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-15: gzugs la sogs par rtog pa dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-16: 'khor lo bsgom pa goms par gyur pas ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-17: grub pa 'jig rten pa dag 'grub 'gyur te //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-18: 'dod pa'i dngos grub chen po ga la zhig / gang zhig sems can rnams la brtse ba yis //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-19: gzhan don dge la rtag tu brtson pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-20: slob ma dag pa rnams la lam dag ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-21: bla ma dam pa'i drin lan 'byung ba yin //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-22: lam bzang rin chen 'di ni bag med kyi //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-23: sems can gzhan pa dag la byin pa na //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-24: rang khyim dgon pa dag tu rab zhugs la //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-25: yul ngan chom rkun rnams kyis 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-26: the tshom 'gyod pa dag dang gnyid dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-27: le lo rgod pa'i chom rkun rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-28: gnyen 'dun thibs po'i nang du zhugs pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-29: lam bzang rin chen dag ni 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-30: srog gcod ma byin gzhan gyi bud med dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-31: brdzun dang tshig rtsub dag dang phra ma dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-32: 'khyal par gyur pa'i tshig dang brnab sems dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-33: gnod sems lta ba ngan pa'i chom rkun dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-34: yod pa'i sdig dang nye ba'i sdig pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-35: gsod 'khu dbang po mngon par zhen pa ste //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-36: chom rkun lnga pa lnga po 'di dag gis //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-37: rin po che ni rtag tu 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-38: shin tu bza' dang btung ba sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-39: longs spyod du ma'i chom rkun de dag gis //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-40: brtson 'grus ldan du zin kyang bag med cing //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-41: brgyal bar gyur pa nyid la 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:110b-42: rang nyid kyis ni yongs su ma brtags par /
T02TD1347.1E:111a-0: @111a * // rin thang chen por gyur pa yin ma yin //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-1: shes par bya phyir g-yon can gzhan la ston //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-2: de yi tshig gis rin chen 'dor bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-3: gang dag rin chen bzang po rig pa rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-4: rin chen chen po yongs su rtog tu gzhug / de dag rnams kyi rnam dag tshig gis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-5: rang gi rin chen rnam par shes par bya //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-6: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-7: pha dang ma dang bu mo sring mo dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-8: bu dang spun zla 'dod pa'i chung ma yi //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-9: gzugs rnams dag gis bdud ni bgegs byed do //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-10: de phyir bla ma dam pas gnang ba yi //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-11: lam bzang rin chen dag ni slob ma yis //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-12: chom rkun rtsa lag yongs su btang byas te //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-13: 'bad pas shin tu legs par sba bar bya //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-14: dpa' bo'i rim pa bdag byin brlab pa yi //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-15: rim pa dag kyang thar pa'i lam ma yin //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-16: shin tu rnam dag rim pa gcig pu ni //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-17: thar pa'i slad du sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan ;
T02TD1347.1E:111a-18: / mtshams med lnga po dag ni byas pa rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-19: dbang don bde ba nyid ni gang zhig gis //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-20: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud dag la //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-21: rgyal ba'i dbang pos yang dag gzung bar gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-22: dpa' bo'i rim pa phyi rol la min te //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-23: lus la srog zad nyid la 'di gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-24: bdag byin brlab pa dag ni stong pa la //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-25: khams gsum po ni mthong bar gyur pa'i mtshan //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-26: 'khor ba snying po med de zad gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-27: de las skyes bu'i sangs rgyas nyid 'bras te //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-28: chu shing gi ni 'bras bu smin pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-29: chu shing nyams pas yang dag 'byung ba bzhin //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-30: sdig pa dang ni shing srin sems can rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-31: gang las byung ba de dag de nyams byed //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-32: de bzhin rnal 'byor dag gi sems de ni //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-33: sgyu ma rnam par nyams par byed pa yin //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-34: gnyis med g-yo ba med dang rigs med dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-35: 'dod dang mchog tu mi 'gyur 'dod chags che //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-36: dngos dang dngos po med pa med pa dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-37: ye shes dang ni sems dpa' kun du bzang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-38: nyon mongs med dang nyon mongs chen po dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-39: lhan skyes dpal ldan byang sems thig le 'dzin //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-40: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-41: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1347.1E:111a-42: snying rje dang ni stong nyid sku //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-0: dus ni kun rdzob @111b gzugs can ma //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-1: stong nyid 'khor lo zhes brjod de //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-3: 'di yi dpal ni myur thob slad //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-4: rtag tu rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-5: rnal 'byor gang zhig sgom pa de'i //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-6: bgegs ni rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-7: dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang ltos 'gro'i bdag dang chom rkun zhags pas 'ching //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-8: chu gter 'khrug dang sha za 'chi ba'i 'jig byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-9: dbul dang bud med dang bral mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs dang rdo rje ltung dang nor nyams rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-10: gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni gsal bar dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-11: glang chen shing rta rta dang rab tu mang ba'i mi mchog thams cad lus la go bgos shing //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-12: lag na mdung dang 'khor lo ral gri mda' gzhus dgra rnams kyis ni g-yul du 'joms byed pa //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-13: 'chi ster drag po'i gzugs can phyogs dang mtshams son dgra de thams cad rang gi mtshon gyis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-14: bcom ste rgyal ba'i grags pa gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dran byed pas kun nas 'thob //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-15: kun nas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shin tu rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin ldan mche ba rnon po gtsigs //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-16: rnga ma g-yo zhing sder mo gug la brtan pas glang chen myos pa'i klad pa rab tu 'gems //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-17: rab khros nyi ma 'char ka'i mig can ro 'dzin ral gri g-yo ba'i gsod 'dod ral pa can //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-18: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de la ring du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-19: mdog sngo mig ni ser skya 'gram pa gnyis po myos pa'i chu bo rab tu mang bas gang //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-20: rnam mang ljon pa mchog rnams rtsad nas 'byin zhing rab tu grugs byed 'brug bzhin sgra dag sgrogs //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-21: lag pas bcing ba byas nas so yi rtse mo dag gis 'byed byed rab mchog glang po'i bdag / gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de yi lus ni gtong bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-22: kun nas me lce rab 'bar phyogs dang mtshams su du ba kun gyis mun pa chen po gtibs //
T02TD1347.1E:111b-23: grong dang dgon pa dus gcig sreg cing skar mda' ltung ba bzhin du me stag 'phro bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-0: sems can rnams la dus kun @112a * //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-1: du ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed phyogs kun khyab par gyur pa'i me //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-2: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de la bsil ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-3: khros shing mig sman sngon po'i mdog dang 'khyog por bgrod pa'i lus can drag po'i phat sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-4: mche ba 'khyog po lce gnyis dang ldan 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed rlung gi shugs can rab tu gtum //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-5: drag po'i mig dang gdengs ka gsal byas yang dag phrad pa za bar byed pa'i gdengs can dbang //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-6: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur ;
T02TD1347.1E:112a-7: / sdang ba'i sems ldan lag pa'i mthil na gzhu dang rna ba'i bar du mda' bkang mdung dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-8: 'khor lo ral gri lag thogs phyogs dang mtshams su gnas pas dam pa'i lam gyis bkag nas //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-9: dgon par lam 'gron skye bo rgyu ba dang phrad 'joms byed drag po'i mig can chom rkun pa //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-10: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de la ring ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-11: lag pa dag ni zhags pas bcings shing rkang pa'i padma zung ni lcags sgrog dag gis gtams //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-12: dge ba'i chu dang bral bas lce dang mgrin pa mchu skams lus po skem zhing bkres pas gzir //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-13: nyin mtshan dus su rje bo khros pa'i bka' yis kun du srung ma rnams kyis srung byed pa //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-14: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de yang de las grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-15: chu gter bzhon pa la zhon mtha' yas drag po'i rlung gis chu yi gter ni 'khrug byed cing //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-16: kun du 'khor bar byed la chu gter chom rkun chu srin nya yi rigs kyis bkag gyur te //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-17: me yi til mar gdug pas 'phangs pa me yi char chen kun nas rgyun du 'bab pa la //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-18: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de yang de las pha rol 'gro //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-19: phat ces 'jigs rung sgra sgrogs kha nas me 'bar lag na gri gug dang ni thod pa thogs //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-20: ro langs gdug pa'i sems ldan phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la yang dag gnas shing 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1347.1E:112a-21: bkres pas gzir te sha dag za zhing mi khrag la dga' lus skams gos dang bral ba dag /
T02TD1347.1E:112b-0: @112b gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs dag 'jigs 'phrog dran pa de la srung ba byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-1: nyin bzhin 'khun zhing sor mo'i rtse mo zlum po nyams te sna dang mchu dang rna ba nyams //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-2: gdong dang mgrin pa rkang lag dag gi rma rnams las ni rnag rul mang po rab tu 'bab //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-3: rul pa'i dri nga'i mthu las gnyen bshes tshogs kyis shi ba'i lus bzhin yongs su btang gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-4: gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs bzang dran byed nad kyis btang zhing 'dod dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-5: 'bar bcas mche rnon gdengs can 'phrog byed sha ra bha dang stag dang glang chen gdong ldan zhing ;
T02TD1347.1E:112b-6: / lag na 'khor lo ral gri mda' dang rtse gsum lcags kyu rdo rje thogs pas phyogs kun du //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-7: byang chub bsam gtan gcig gzhol mchog bde la gnas sgrub pa po sdigs dbang po'i pho nya gang //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-8: de dag rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma zhabs gang gi rang yid la byed de la nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-9: dbyar ni nags nas grong gi bar du 'dam rdzab kyis gang lam dag la yang khur khyer zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-10: dgun ni gos dang bral bas kha ba'i lam du bgrod cing yul gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro bar byed //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-11: so ga chu med 'jigs bcas mya ngan lam du nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs dbul po gang //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-12: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs bzang sgom byed sdug bsngal de dag gis btang 'dod dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-13: mchan khung mig dang rna ba sna dang kha lus brjod pa dag las mi bzad dri 'byung zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-14: bud med kun dang bral bas dus kun du ni dga' ba'i bde ba dang bral skal ngan te //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-15: mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis rtag tu bud med sdang bar gyur pa gang la de dag kun //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-16: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni bde ba mchog sbyin bsgoms pas skal bzang kha dog gzugs can 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-17: 'khus phyir g-yog 'khor gang la mi dbang 'khrugs te 'jigs pa'i gshin rje lta bur mtha' gcig tu //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-18: gsod pa la zhen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sde rnams myur du yang dag skul byed pa //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-19: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyi mgon dag rang yid la bsgoms pas //
T02TD1347.1E:112b-20: de dag rnams kyi de yang rab tu zhi zhing 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pas mchog sbyin 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-1: tu ni mkha' las rdo rje rab ltung bud med 'grogs las rtag par yang //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-2: skye dang skye ba gzhan slad 'chi dang brgyal dang chags bral slar yang byed pas rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-3: dpal ldan las dang ye shes mchog gi chu skyes la gnas rdo rje'i zhabs dag bsgoms pa yis ;
T02TD1347.1E:113a-4: / de dag rnams kyi de yang rab zhi 'chi ba nyid 'gyur slar yang skye ba ldan pa min //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-5: gang dag nyin dang mtshan mor bud med 'grogs la rnam par chags pas nor kun nyams 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-6: skye ba gzhan gyis bag chags bsgos pa'i sems las de ni slar yang mang po rab 'byung bas ;
T02TD1347.1E:113a-7: / shes rab rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi mi mnyam mnyam pa'i zhal ni sna tshogs gzugs can gang //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-8: rgyal ba mchog gis mchod cing bstod pa bsgoms pas de ni nor kun nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-9: ser skya lug dang kun 'dar ma ste nyi zla sgra gcan lam gsum bgrod rnams rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-10: dngos dang dngos med rab nyams mnyam bgrod zhabs de dag ni de dag rnams kyi ye shes sku //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-11: de yi lhan skyes bde ba'i go 'phang 'gyur med gcig 'di de dag de nyid gang gis dran //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-12: de yi skye ba 'di la ma lus 'jigs 'phrog 'dir brjod 'bras bu myur du 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-13: dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi gnas ni rdo rje nor bu'i khyim ste der 'jug lam //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-14: nyon mongs med cing bdud nyams sngon du rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstod pa bdag gis 'dir brjod do //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-15: skyes bu gang dag bdud kyi grogs kyis rtag tu mi bden mun par song zhing lam nyams pa //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-16: de dag rnams kyis lam 'di thob nas rdo rje nor bu'i khyim dang ring min 'ong gyur cig / du ba la sogs lam gyis lhan skyes bde ba'i go 'phang bsgoms na de ni dus 'khor lo //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-17: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yan lag 'gro ba'i bla ma chos kyi 'khor lo 'di la gnas //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-18: lha rnams mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis zhabs kyi padma la gtugs shing //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-19: dam pa'i lam ni ston byed nyin mor byed pa bzhin du mun pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:113a-20: lha klu mi dang lha min dbang po'i cod pan dag gis zhabs pad la gtugs gang //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-0: yang dag @113b ye shes nyin byed 'gro ba gsum gyi dpal ldan chos kyi 'khor lor gnas //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-1: bdud dang nyon mongs ri dags rab gtum gsod byed dpal ldan sh'akya seng ge de'i //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-2: rtag tu 'gro la brtse dang de yi shes rab kyis bskul 'grel bshad bdag gis bri //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-3: k'a yig las ni rgyu zhi ba //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-4: la yig 'di la thim pa nyid //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-5: tsa yig gis ni g-yo ba'i sems //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-6: kra yig rim pa bcings las so //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-7: dus ni 'gyur med bde ye shes //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-8: thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-10: shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid do //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-12: / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor thams cad nas //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-13: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa 'di //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-14: mngon par brjod pa'i rjod byed 'gyur //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-15: bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan zhing //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-16: 'jam dpal gyis ni bskul gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-17: 'jig rten mgon po bdag gis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-19: byis pa mkhas pa rmongs rnams la //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-20: rgyud kyi gsang ba gsal byed de //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-21: ma yis bu la phan pa bzhin //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-22: lus can thams cad bde don du'o //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i lam mchog ni //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-24: gang gis rnal 'byor pas rig byed //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-25: de phyir dri ma med pa'i 'od //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-27: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba las bdud dang bgegs mtha' dag nyams par byed pa mchog gi 'dod pa'i lha dang dam pa'i lam nges pa'i mdor bsdus pa chen po ste dang po'o /
T02TD1347.1E:113b-29: // /'dir dang por re zhig rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs te brjod bya dang rjod byed dang 'brel pa la sogs pa dang bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pa lung bstan pa brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1347.1E:113b-30: phyi nas bsdus pa'i rgyud la dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:113b-31: 'di la dang por re zhig brjod bya dang rjod byed dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams mngon par gzigs nas /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-0: gdul bya'i skye bo nges pa dang bral ba rnams la rang gi sems kyi bsam pas skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba bde ba chen po'i gnas @114a * //
T02TD1347.1E:114a-1: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo'i rgyal po dang lha dang klu dang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-3: khams gsum pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-4: khams gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-5: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo //
T02TD1347.1E:114a-7: zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab par gyur pas /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-8: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-10: rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo //
T02TD1347.1E:114a-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pas 'khyud pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-12: rgyud thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig mngon du gyur pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-13: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog kha 'byed pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-14: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa la brten pa ;
T02TD1347.1E:114a-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa rnam pa bzhi dang rdo rje rnam pa bzhis yongs su dag pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-16: sku bzhi dang rigs drug dang bden pa bcu gnyis dang de kho na nyid bcu drug dang stong pa nyid bcu drug dang snying rje bcu drug gi bdag nyid kyi brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-17: dbang bskur ba 'jig rten pa'i bcu dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bcu gcig pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-19: las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen mo dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rab tu gsal bar byed pa /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams dang nang dang mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ;
T02TD1347.1E:114a-21: sgrub thabs dang ye shes te le'u lnga'i bdag nyid dam brtag pa lnga'i bdag nyid ni mi la sogs pa'i sems can mtha' dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bstan to //
T02TD1347.1E:114a-22: de las bsdus pa'i rgyud yang dag par sdud par byed pa la 'jam dpal dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-23: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams gdul bar bya ba'i don du 'grel bshad byed pa la bdag dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114a-24: rgyud ston pa'i don du gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa gzhan rnams dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-0: shambha la'i yul la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dam @114b pa'i lam thob pa la de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-1: 'dir rdul phra rab 'dus pa sngon du 'gro ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams sngon du 'gro ba ni sems can rnams so //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-3: sems can sngon du 'gro ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-4: mngon par dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa goms pas 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-5: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sngon du 'gro ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag dang skye ba snga ma'i stong pa nyid dang snying rje kun rdzob dang dmigs pa med pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis rdul phra rab 'dus pa las 'das shing /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-6: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa dang bral ba phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-7: de bas na dang por 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brtag pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-8: de nas nang gi brtag pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-9: de nas dbang bskur ba'i brtag pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-10: de nas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i brtag pa'i //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-11: de nas mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i brtag pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-12: de ltar na rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ni brtag pa lnga'am le'u lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-13: 'dir thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:114b-14: de yang le'u lnga po 'di'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas te /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-15: dang por re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams gyi le'u la thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa la sogs pa ston pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-16: gnas bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-17: 'khor chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-18: gsol ba 'debs pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-19: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa zhus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:114b-20: stong pa chen po'i yi ge lnga la sogs pa dang sna tshogs 'byung ba dang dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba gsol ba 'debs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-0: ston pa po'i lan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas @115a * //
T02TD1347.1E:115a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang sems can dang sngags dang srog la sogs pa 'byung ba dang sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-3: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang rgya mtsho dang gling dang ri'i grangs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-4: srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-5: 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-6: shin tu phra ba'i dbugs la sogs pas nyin mo'i tshad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-7: 'jam dpal lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-8: grub pa'i mtha' dang byed pa'i skar rtsis kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-9: dbu ma'i rtsa'i dbugs rnams las gza'i rkang pa dang rgyu skar gyi rkang pa skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-10: khyim bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas sa 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-11: dbyangs 'char ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-12: sgra gcan la sogs pa sa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-13: rdzong 'joms pa dang bsrung ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-14: 'khor los sgyur bas dum bu bcu gnyis su 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-15: kla klo'i chos bcom nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu 'jog pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-16: sems can mtha' dag la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi lam sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-17: 'jam dpal dang 'jig rten dbang phyug sngon dang phyi mar ston pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-18: 'khor los sgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rigs ldan gyi mthar thug pa mi rnams mchog gi tshe'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi le'u la'o /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-20: // / de nas nang gi le'u la dang por mngal 'dzin pa dang sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-21: rdul dang [?] khu ba dang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par sbyor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-22: zla ba so so re re zhing mngal 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-23: nya la sogs pa gnas skabs bcu'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115a-24: sku bzhi dang rdo rje bzhi dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-0: @115b rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa bzhis mngal 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-1: dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-2: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang tshigs kyi gnas sum brgya drug cu dang khams drug dang ro drug dang dbang po drug dang yul drug dang las kyi dbang po drug dang las kyi dbang po'i yul drug dang rnam par shes pa drug dang 'du byed drug dang tshor ba drug dang 'du shes drug dang gzugs drug dang ye shes drug dang 'khor lo drug dang dkyil 'khor drug steng dang 'og gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-3: lte ba'i chu skyes la sogs pa'i 'dab ma dang sna bug dag la g-yon dang g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor phung po lnga dang khams lnga 'bab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-4: dbu ma las rgyud mtha' dag 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-5: srog la sogs pa rlung gi bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-6: khams rnams las lha'i mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-7: nyi ma dang zla ba dang me'i 'chi ltas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-8: las kyi rnam par smin pas 'gro ba drug tu skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-9: rtsa la sogs pa gza'i rkang pa 'chad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-10: dbu mar zhugs pa'i dga' ba la sogs pa rnams kyis 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba bslu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-11: phyi rol 'jig rten pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-12: lta ba thams cad rjes su dpag pas yongs su brtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-13: sems can sna tshogs kyi 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun par chos rab tu gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba ni nang gi le'u la'o /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-15: // / de nas dbang gi le'u la dang por bla ma yongs su brtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-16: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i slob ma yongs su brtags te bsdu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-17: las rab 'byam bsgrub pa la grong la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi cha dang sa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:115b-18: thab khung dang sbyin sreg gi rdzas dang bgrang phreng dang gdan dang phur bu dang bum pa dang rdul tshon dang thig skud dang 'khrul 'khor dgod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-0: sa yongs su gzung ba dang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang de nyid bcu @116a * //
T02TD1347.1E:116a-1: yongs su shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-2: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-3: thams cad rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-4: dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'dus pa dang dam tshig gi mchod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-5: rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi lha mo'i phyag rgya dang lta stangs dang mtshan ma dang dam tshig gi brda dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-6: rigs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-8: chu bo chen po la sogs pa dang rang rang gi khyim du rdul tshon dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol te mchod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-9: dpal ldan bla ma dbul ba thams cad kyis mnyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba ni dbang gi le'u la'o /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-11: // / de nas sgrub thabs kyi le'u la dang por bsrung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa dang gdong dag pa dang rang gi snying kha'i zla ba'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa spro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-12: bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-13: skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang bdag nyid dbul ba dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-14: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang lam brten pa dang stong pa nyid la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-15: skyed pa'i rim pa la dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las rgyal mchog dang thig le'i rnal 'byor dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-16: phyi rol 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-17: mchod sbyin la sogs pa dang rig byed kyi mtha' gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes dang yan lag drug gi sbyor ba la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116a-18: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-0: mngon sum dang lkog tu gyur pa'i sems @116b bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub thabs kyi le'u la'o /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-2: // / de nas ye shes kyi le'u la dang por lus kyi rus pa la sogs pa'i khams rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rigs drug gi lha'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-5: ka la sogs pa sngags kyi rigs drug gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-6: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-7: thabs dang shes rab dang bya ba dang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa dang sdom pa chen po dang 'khor los sgyur ba drug spro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-8: dbang bzhi pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-9: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-10: byang chub kyi sems bsten pa'i sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-11: shes pa dang shes bya rnam pa kun gyi bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-12: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bya ba thams cad rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-13: chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsdu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-15: nam mkha'i khams la ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-18: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis chos bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-19: bcud dang bcud len la sogs pa lus kyi dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:116b-20: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde bas sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:117a-1: dag par bsdu ba dang rtsis kyi ming bsdu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:117a-2: yi ge lnga dang yi ge drug gi stong pa chen po dang thig le stong pa la bstod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi le'u la'o /
T02TD1347.1E:117a-4: // / des na rim pa 'dis gsungs pa'i phyir le'u lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ni 'dir brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-5: 'di ston par byed pa'i le'u'i tshogs rgyud kyi rgyal po ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-6: brjod bya rjod byed 'di dag phan tshun brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:117a-7: brjod par bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo le'u lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs pa yin la rjod par byed pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo rjod par byed pa le'u lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-8: yang dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni brjod par bya ba yin la rjod par byed pa ni dang po'i sangs rgyas rjod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid ni brjod bya rjod byed kyi 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-9: de nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa las 'jig rten pa'i dbang sbyin pas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don byed pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-10: shes rab chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa sbyin pas rigs med pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa ste //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-11: brjod bya la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag nyid mngon par gzigs nas /
T02TD1347.1E:117a-12: gdul bya'i skye bo nges pa dang bral ba rnams la rang gi sems kyi bsam pas zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-13: nges pa ni nyan thos pa'i mchog gi sdom pa 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa dang bral ba'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ste de dang bral ba ni nges pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-14: de dag gi rang gi sems kyi bsam pa ni 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117a-15: de bzhin du dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba chen po 'dod pa ni nges pa dang bral ba rnams kyi rang gi sems kyi bsam pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-0: rang gi sems kyi bsam pa 'dis skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'di mi'i skye ba la sangs rgyas nyid kyi @117b 'bras bu rab tu ster ba rgyud kyi rgyal po'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-1: lha la sogs pa 'gro ba lnga'i skye ba la ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-3: las kyis ma yin par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-4: 'dir lha la sogs pa rnams la yang mi'i skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-5: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-6: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag dang khams drug gi bdag nyid can skyes bu chen po'i gang zag la'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-7: rnam pa gzhan du las ngan pa dang ldan pa'i mi'i skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i des pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-8: ci ste sngags kyi theg pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-9: gdol ba smyig ma mkhan sogs dang //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-10: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa rnams //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-11: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes spyad na //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-12: skye 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes pa yin no zhe na /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di ni bden te /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-14: skye ba 'di la sngar mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa mi bzad pa'i las gang byas pa de dag sngags kyi theg pa 'dir phyag rgya chen po mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom nas /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-15: mi dge ba glo bur pa gzhan mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje chos 'byung gi khang par bdud bzhi dang bgegs kyi dgra 'jug pa'i sgo rnams la byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-16: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sgo glegs bcug nas /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-17: de nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya chen po dang lhan cig tu bsgrubs te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa po rnams kyang skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes byas ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed kyi /
T02TD1347.1E:117b-18: sngags kyi theg par zhugs pa'i rjes la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa mi bzad pa'i las byed pa rnams kyang skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par bzhed pa ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:117b-19: 'dir theg pa gsum ka la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ni thog mar dge ba /
T02TD1347.1E:118a-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir sngags kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i rjes la sdig pa byas kyang sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-2: 'o na sngags kyi theg pa 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sha bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la de nyid kyang rtag tu srog bcad pa las 'byung ste srog bcad pa med par ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe sring ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-3: gal te za ba po med na gsod pa po yang mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-4: de'i phyir zab po dang gsod pa po dag srog gcod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-5: 'dir yang nyi ma so sor sngags pas dam tshig bzhi bya'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o zhe na /
T02TD1347.1E:118a-6: de ni bden te rgyu gang gi phyir mtshan ma dang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pas srog gcod par 'gyur ba rgyu de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mtshan ma med pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa go ku la sogs pa bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-7: 'dir yul gang na 'jig rten pa rnams kyis gang bza' ba ma yin pa dang gang btsong pa ma yin pa go ku la sogs pa rang gi las kyis shi ba dang g-yul du las ngan pa'am rang gi skyon gyis chom rkun la sogs pa bsad pa de dag thams cad rnal 'byor pas bza' bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-8: rdzas kyis nyos pa ni ma yin zhing pha mes la sogs pa dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i bya ba las bsad pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD1347.1E:118a-9: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i sha bza'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-10: yang gang zhig nyi ma so sor dam tshig bya ba de ni kha na ma thob med pa'i go ku la sogs pa lnga dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'i ril bu nyungs kar gyi tshad tsam nyi ma so sor dam tshig bsten pa'i don du bya'o //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-11: rtag par kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chang dang bud med ni bsgom pa'i slad du rmongs pa med pa'i chos kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-13: lha dang rang 'jigs pha mes dang //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-14: 'dod grub don dang btsong phyir yang //
T02TD1347.1E:118a-15: gdul dka' sdig pa byed rnams kyis //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-0: @118b gnod byed min pa'i sems can bsad //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-1: de yi sha de nyo ba dang //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-2: za 'dod kha na ma tho bcas //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-3: ma blangs snod du lhung gyur pa //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-4: de nyid kha na ma tho med //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-5: srog chags gcig gi sha dag ni //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-6: mang po rnams kyis zos pa mchog / srog chags du ma'i sha dag ni //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-7: yid skyes gcig gis zos pa min //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-8: snying rje bskyed de de nyid las //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-9: rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-10: rnal 'byor ldan pas bza' bya ba //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-11: kha na ma tho med gzhan min //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-12: rigs su 'dzin pa gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-13: rtag tu bza' dang btung ba dang //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-14: rigs min mngon bgrod rdo rje can /
T02TD1347.1E:118b-15: de nyid gzigs pa dag gis gsungs zhes pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-16: de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas nges pa dang bral ba rnams la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba ni rgyud kyi rgyal po'o //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-17: sangs rgyas nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T02TD1347.1E:118b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T02TD1347.1E:118b-20: lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T02TD1347.1E:118b-21: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnam par 'byor pa ste de ster ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-22: bde ba chen po'i gnas zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i gnas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can dog pa med pa'i chos 'byung 'jig rten gyi dpe las 'das pa kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po'i gnas so //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-23: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zhes pa ni rigs med pa shes pa dang shes bya gcig tu 'dres par gyur cing gcad du med la dbyer med pa rnam pa thams cad du dbyings kyi mtshan nyid me long gi pra phab pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:118b-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der ro //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-25: rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa ni rdo rje seng ge'i khri zla ba dang nyi ma dang me'i dkyil 'khor gcad du med cing dbyer med pa'am ae yig nam mkha'i khams ni rdo rje seng ge'i khri'o //
T02TD1347.1E:118b-26: de la bzhugs pa ni rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid wam yig ste rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-0: @119a * // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo'i rgyal po dang lha dang klu dang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba zhes pa la sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-1: byang chub sems dpa' ni kun du bzang po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-2: khor bo'i rgyal po ni gtsug tor la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-3: lha ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-4: klu ni mtha' yas la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-5: lha mo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-6: chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-7: shin tu sngon mo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-8: tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-9: goo r'i la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-10: khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste de dag gi 'dus pa ni tshogs so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-11: des yongs su bskor ba ni lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba ste lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-12: khams gsum pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa zhes pa la khams gsum pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa ste de dag gis gang gi zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa de ni khams gsum pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa ste khams gsum pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-13: khams gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba zhes pa ni gang gi chos kyi 'khor lo khams gsum du cig ca [?] ra rab tu 'khor ba de ni khams gsum pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste khams gsum pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-14: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes pa la mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas ni skad cig gcig dang rnam pa lnga dang rnam pa nyi shu dang sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba ni mchog yin la /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-15: des dang por sangs rgyas pa ni mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119a-16: rigs med pa zhes pa la rigs ni shes rab dang /
T02TD1347.1E:119a-17: thabs kyi bdag nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos te rigs de gang gis spangs pa de ni rigs med pa ste rigs med pa de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-0: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo shes pa la bcom ldan ni bdud dang nyon mongs pa bcom @119b pa'i phyir bcom pa dang dbang phyug la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs te bcom pa de 'di la ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan no //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-1: dus ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid de des gang gi lus phung po dang khams la sogs pa sgrib pa med pa'i 'khor lor bskyed pa de ni dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-2: gzhan yang yi ge so so re res te //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-3: k'a yig gis ni rgyu zhi ba //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-4: la yig 'di la thim pa nyid //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-5: tsa yig gis ni g-yo ba'i sems //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-6: kra yig rim pa bcings las so //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-7: rim pa ni lus la sogs pa'i thig le rnams 'pho ba yin la de lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas bcings pa ni k'a la tsa kra ste bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-8: zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab par gyur pas zhes pa ni 'di ni zla ba yang yin la bzang po yang yin pa'i phyir zla ba bzang po ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyan pa por gyur pa rdo rje zla ba dri ma med pa'i 'od do //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-9: sems can thams cad kyi skad tha dad pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pas chos gsungs pa rnams yang dag par sdud par byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyan pa por gyur pa'i gsang ba'i bdag po ste gsang ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag las mchog tu gyur pa rdo rje'i theg pa'o de'i yang dag par sdud par sdud pa po yin pas na bdag po ste gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-10: de bzhin du phyi rol du ni 'jig rten gyi bden pas gsang ba'i sgras gnod sbyin rnams te de dag gi bdag po ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-11: ro ldan na gnas pa ni phyi rol du ro'i sgras srog nyams pa shi ba'i tshogs so //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-12: de 'di la yod pa'i phyir ro ldan te dur khrod kyi sa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:119b-13: de na gnod sbyin chen po sems can rnams la rnam par mtho 'tsham zhing bgegs du ma byed pa po dag yod la de dag gsod par byed pa po ni ro ldan na gnas pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:119b-14: nags kyi ri dags kyi bdag po zhes pa bzhin du ro ldan na gnas pa gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi bdag po'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-0: nang du ni ro zhes pa dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa sum stong drug brgyas dman pa'i nyi @120a * //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-1: khri gcig stong drug brgya rnams 'gog pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-2: de 'di la yod pa ni chos kyi sprin gyis ste de la gnas pa ni ro ldan na gnas pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-3: bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya dang snyoms 'jug gi sgrib pa'i gnod sbyin rnams gsod par byed pa ni gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ste ;
T02TD1347.1E:120a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi seng ge'i sgra dang sems can so so'i sgra dag gis bstan pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston par byed pa po sprul pa'i sku phyag na rdo rje zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab par gyur pa de yis so //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-5: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni brjod bya mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas rjod par byed pa'i phyir te brjod bya 'di rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-6: dus kyi 'khor lo ni brjod bya dus kyi 'khor lo rjod par byed pa'i phyir dus kyi 'khor lo'i rjod byed do //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-7: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa zhes pa ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i 'bum phrag gsum gyi yi ge'i tshogs te yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rjes su bsngags pa stong phrag bcu gnyis yod pa ni stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-8: rigs med pa zhes pa ni brjod bya rigs med pa rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-9: 'dir rigs ni shes rab kyi phyogs dang thabs kyi phyogs te phyogs spangs pa gang gi phyir rigs de med pa'i rgyud de ni rigs med pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces rgyal bas gnyis su med par gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-10: brjod par bya ba thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la /
T02TD1347.1E:120a-11: thabs dang shes rab kyi phyogs tha dang [?] na thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi brjod par bya ba med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-12: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi brjod par bya ba med na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-13: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes med na sangs rgyas nyid kyang med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120a-14: sangs rgyas nyid med na 'khor ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-0: 'dir rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba 'brel pa med par thabs kyi ming can gyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la thabs dang shes rab @120b kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa dang rnal 'byor brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-1: rnal 'byor gyi sgra ni thabs kyi don rjod par byed pa'am shes rab kyi don rjod par byed pa yang ma yin te rnal 'byor gyi sgra ni thabs dang shes rab kyi don rjod par byed pa'i //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-2: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.1E:120b-3: rnal 'byor thabs kyi lus dang ni //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-4: shes rab gcig pu dag gis min //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-5: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas rnal 'byor gsungs zhes so //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-7: de'i phyir rgyud gang la thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi brjod par bya ba yod pa'i rgyud de ni don dam par shes rab kyi rgyud kyang ma yin la thabs kyi rgyud kyang ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-8: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i dbye bas phung po dang khams rnam par dag pa las thabs dang shes rab shes kyi phyogs su dbang po rtul po'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-9: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i ming can la yang ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-10: 'dir 'di la rnal 'byor gyi ngang tshul yod pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-11: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma yang ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-12: de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa nyid las rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-13: des na don dam pa'i bden pas thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rigs med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pas 'khyud pa zhes pa ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mngon par brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-15: 'dir ji ltar mtshan yang dag par brjod pa [?] 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsung ba de bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas kyang ngo //
T02TD1347.1E:120b-16: dang po'i sgras ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i don to //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-0: thog ma med pa'i dus su thog ma med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang ston par 'gyur ba dang ston pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang sh'akya thub pa 'ba' zhig gis @121a * //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-1: gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-3: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-5: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-6: yang yang gsung ba gang yin dang //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-9: dpag med dgyes pa rnam dag gis //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-10: gang yang yang dag glur blangs pa zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-11: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig 'di'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags kyi theg pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-12: 'dir 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas sh'akya thub pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis kyang sngags kyi theg pa ma gsungs so zhes pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na zhes pa ste /
T02TD1347.1E:121a-13: 'phags pa'i yul du chos ston pa'i dus na rigs bzhi'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan zhing skal pa med pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i yul du 'khor rnams la ma bstan te /
T02TD1347.1E:121a-14: dus gzhan du yul gzhan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor la yang ma bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'di'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa gsum ston par byed pa po yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-16: rnam pa gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.1E:121a-17: rdo rje'i theg pa ston par byed pa po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-18: de'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa gsum ston par byed pa po dang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston par byed pa po yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-19: de'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:121a-20: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig mngon du gyur pa zhes pa ni rdo rje theg pa 'dir sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad la rdo rje'i tshig tu sbas te bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-0: bzhi pa ni gsum pa ma yin te bzhi pa @121b zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-1: de yang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1347.1E:121b-2: shes rab ye shes de nyid bzhi par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i tshig tu sbas pa yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-4: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad la rdo rje'i tshig rab tu gsal ba ma yin zhing bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas rtogs par bya ba yin te rgyud ni rgyud gzhan dag gis rtogs par bya zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-5: sngags kyi tshul 'di la rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob yin la gnyis pa ni don dam pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-6: de dag las 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi rdo rje'i tshig ni gsod pa la sogs pa'i las la dam tshig grub pa ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-7: don dam pa'i bden pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ni bzhi pa de yang de bzhin te /
T02TD1347.1E:121b-8: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-9: dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di la rdo rje'i tshig de dag nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa dang bshad pa dang rab tu bshad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar mdzad do //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-10: de nyid bsgrub pa la phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa du ba la sogs pa mtshan ma'i lam rab tu gsal bar mdzad de /
T02TD1347.1E:121b-11: stong par rtse gcig yid byas te //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-12: nyi ma gcig ni yongs su brtag ces pas so //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di'i phyir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la rdo rje'i tshig phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i lam du ba la sogs pa rab tu gsal ba yin gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ma yin la bla ma'i bkas byin gyis brlabs pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-14: lam 'di la yang nyin dang mtshan mor yid ches pa yod de nyi ma gcig ni yongs su brtag ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-15: 'dir du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma [?] phor nas gzhan sngags la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs nyi ma gcig gis rnal 'byor pas yongs su brtag par bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:121b-16: mtshan ma yang rnam pa gsum ste dang po'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122a-0: dang po'i mtshan ma ni du ba la sogs pa'i lam dang @122a * //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-1: sbyor ba yan lag drug gis sku rdzogs pa'i 'gyur ba med pa'i skad cig thob pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-2: bar ma'i mtshan ma ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i skad cig brgya phrag bcva brgyad kyis sa dang po thob pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ma mthong ba'i don yang dag par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122a-3: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-4: tha ma'i mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'chang nyid de mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i skad cig drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis sa bcu gnyis pa thob nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-5: rdo rje'i tshig la sogs pa mtshan ma sngon du 'gro ba can 'di dag rab tu gsal bar rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-6: de'i phyir rgyud ni rgyud gzhan tshol ba rnams la rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig mngon du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-7: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog kha 'byed pa zhes pa la sangs rgyas rin chen ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba yin la za ma tog ni rdo rje dang padma ste sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog go //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-8: de nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po gang gis kha 'byed pa de ni sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog kha 'byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-9: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa la rten pa zhes pa la 'jig rten pa'i bden pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par rtog pa'i bsgom pa skyed pa'i rim pas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems rdzogs pa'i rim pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni lhan cig skyes pa rnam par mi rtog pa ste rnam pa thams cad du zhal dang phyag dang kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-12: bden pa 'di dag la rten pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa la brten pa ste lam gnyis ka ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:122a-13: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bzhi dang rdo rje bzhis yongs su dag pa zhes pa ni skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-0: rnam pa lngas @122b mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-1: rnam pa nyi shus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-2: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste 'di rnams kyis yongs su dag pa ni mngal skyes bskyed pa'i rim pa dang du ba la sogs pa sku rdzogs pa rdzogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-3: de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bzhis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-4: sku bzhi dang rigs drug dang bden pa bcu gnyis dang de kho na nyid bcu drug dang stong pa nyid bcu drug dang snying rje bcu drug dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang dang las dang ye shes dang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi lam rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes pa la /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-5: sku bzhi ni dag pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa rnams mngal skyes rnams kyi bzhi pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-6: shin tu gnyid log pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-7: rmi lam dang sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid can te de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-8: rigs drug ni mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ye shes kyi khams dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-9: rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-13: gzugs sa'i khams te mngal skyes rnams kyi rigs drug sgrib pa dang bcas pa yin la sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-14: bden pa bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-15: 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-19: tshor ba dang sred pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:122b-23: rga shi ste mngal skyes rnams kyi bden pa bcu gnyis ni sgrib pa ngang bcas pa yin la sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-24: 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi srog gi dbye bas srog gi rlung rgyu ba'i phyir mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-25: yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:122b-26: de kho na nyid bcu drug ni sprul pa'i sku dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-4: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gsung dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-5: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i thugs dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-6: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-12: lhan cig skyes pa'i gsung dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-13: lhan cig skyes pa'i thugs dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-17: khyad par gyi dga' ba dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i dbye bas de kho na nyid bcu drug mngal skyes rnams kyi ni sgrib pa dang bcas pa yin te bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni sgrib pa dang bral ba yin te bcu drug phyed phyed theg le 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-20: stong pa nyid bcu drug ces pa ni nag po'i phyogs /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-21: dang nyi ma dang shes rab bo //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-22: snying rje bcu drug ces pa ni dkar po'i phyogs dang zla ba dang thabs so //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-23: stong pa nyid la dbye ba gsum ste /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-25: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-26: don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-27: de la stong pa nyid ni phung po lnga stong pa nyid de nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa tshes lnga'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-28: chen po stong pa nyid ni khams lnga stong pa nyid de drug pa la sogs pa tshes lnga'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-29: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dbang po lnga stong pa nyid de bcu gcig pa la sogs pa tshes lnga'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-30: de nas gnam stong gi mthar thug pa tshes bcva lnga ni stong pa nyid bcva lnga'o ;
T02TD1347.1E:123a-31: / gnam stong gi mtha' dang dkar po'i tshes gcig 'jug pa'i dang po'i dbus su bcu drug pa rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-32: de bzhin du snying rje rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-33: sems can la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123a-36: de la sems can la dmigs pa ni dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa [?] chos lnga'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-37: chos la dmigs pa ni drug pa la sogs pa tshes lnga'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123a-38: dmigs pa med pa ni bcu gcig pa la sogs pa [?] chos lnga ste nya'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-0: nya'i mtha' dang nag po'i tshes gcig 'jug @123b pa dang po'i dbus su snying rje bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-1: 'di dag gcig pa nyid ni stong pa nyid bcu drug dang snying rje bcu drug gi bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ste de'i rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-2: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes pa la re zhig 'jig rten pa ni chu dang ;
T02TD1347.1E:123b-11: shes rab ye shes te mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang bcu ni lus dang ngag dang sems dang ye shes dang khams dang phung po dang /
T02TD1347.1E:123b-12: skye mched dang las kyi dbang po la sogs pa yongs su dag par bya ba'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa bcu gcig pa ni bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i nges pas phyag rgya chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid bla ma'i zhal las lus dang ngag la sogs pa sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis sbyong bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-14: las dang ye shes dang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ces pa la las kyi phyag rgya ni nu ma dang skrar ldan pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-15: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni rang gi sems kyis yongs su brtags pa'o //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-16: phyag rgya chen mo ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba pra phab pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-17: 'di rnams kyi dngos grub ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1347.1E:123b-18: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-19: gzugs kyi srid pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-20: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang bral ba rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD1347.1E:123b-21: sku bzhi la sogs pa 'di dag gi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1347.1E:124a-0: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams dang nang dang dbang dang sgrub thabs dang ye shes te le'u lnga'i bdag nyid dam brtag pa lnga'i bdag nyid mi la sogs pa'i sems can mtha' dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan to zhes pa ni @124a * //
T02TD1347.1E:124a-1: yang dag pa'i rnam pas te rdo rje'i tshig tu sbas pa'i rnam pas ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.1E:124a-2: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di las bsdus pa'i rgyud yang dag par sdud par byed pa la 'jam dpal dang /
T02TD1347.1E:124a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams gdul bar bya ba'i don du 'grel bshad byed pa la bdag dang /
T02TD1347.1E:124a-4: rgyud ston par byed pa la gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1347.1E:124a-5: shambha la'i yul la sogs pa grong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad theg pa chen po'i lam thob pa la de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to zhes pa ni mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa 'di las bsdus pa'i rgyud yang dag par sdud par byed pa la 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to //
